original_text: And the rest of the acts of Solomon, and all that he did, and his wisdom, are they not written in the book of the acts of Solomon?
korean_text: 솔로몬의 남은 사적과 그의 행한 모든 일과 그의 지혜는 솔로몬의 실록에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: And the rest of the acts of Solomon
are they not written in the book of the acts of Solomon?
